content.question: Which of the following practices is more common in authoritarian political systems than in democratic political systems?

choices.label: Censorship of citizens' use of the Internet and social media
The incorporation of the principle of federalism in the constitution
The presence of a monarch as the symbolic head of state

content.answer: Censorship of citizens' use of the Internet and social media

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
